page.title: 08Playground Games
page.content: The two most popular playground games: The infants like to play{Star Wars best. For this game you have to pretend to be characters from the film "Star Wars". Everyone goes around chasing each other and having battles. They pretend to have guns and shoot each other and then they pretend to be dead. The girls just run around screaming or getting chased by the boys. { Skipping games}The children see how long they can skip with a skipping rope and they do skipping patterns as well. The children use the skipping ropes for playing horses. A lot of children play skipping and there is one game were you jump off the rope and say a colour. If you guess the right colour then you have a turn.
